doc.title: Kayla Crow
doc.plot: After Kayla Crow is discharged under mysterious circumstances from the White Cells, an ultra-elite dark-ops team, she's returned to a family and desert town in shambles. Forced to care for her dysfunctional sister and senile grandmother, Kayla finds herself working as a freelance assassin and strong arm for a sinister criminal organization that tyrannizes her desert. When Kayla finds her sister entangled in her employers' web, she attempts to right the situation with disastrous results. Her grandmother butchered and and sister kidnapped, Kayla sets out to avenge her family at all costs.
